citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on
24-Oct-17. Licensee was contacted by phone after we arrived at the facility. Licensee was unavailable for
inspection.
Responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on
24-Oct-17.  Licensee was contacted by phone after we arrived at the facility. Licensee was unavailable for
inspection. 
Responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
